Question
========
In a regression study about the relation between two variables $X$ and $Y$ we got $\bar x=7$ and $r^2=0.9$.
If the equation of the regression line of $Y$ on $X$ is $y-x=1$, compute


a. The mean of $Y$.

a. The equation of the regression line of $X$ on $Y$.

a. What value does this regression model predict for $x=6$? And for $y=10$?

Solution
========

a. $\bar y=8$.

a. Regression line of $X$ on $Y$: $x=0.9y-0.2$.

a. $y(6)=7$ and $x(10)=8.8$.
